Web Component examples

Details Display Code
An interactive WebComponent is integrated to the page. 
<ui-button></ui-button>
A WebComponent is styled by the integrating page. A brown color text is applied and also the font style is inherited by the integrating page. 
<ui-button style="color: brown;"></ui-button>
A property value of the WebComponent has been set by the integrating page which displays and additional button of the WebComponent. 
<ui-button add-clear-button="true"></ui-button>
The integrating page subscribes to a findished rendering event. This behavior can be observed by simulating a slow network.
rendering...
 
<div id="renderingText">rendering...</div>
<div class="card">
  <div class="container">
    <data-display id="dataDisplay" address="http://localhost:5500/data"></data-display>
    <script>
      document.getElementById("dataDisplay").addEventListener('finsihedRendering', () => {
        document.getElementById("renderingText").innerHTML = "rendering has finished...";
      });
    </script>
  </div>
</div>
The integrating page switches WebComponents using JS methods. 
<button onclick="addUiButtonFunction()">Add UiButton element</button>
<button onclick="addDataDisplayFunction()">Add DataDisplay element</button>
<script>
  function addUiButtonFunction() {
    document.getElementById("replaceWebComponent").innerHTML = "<ui-button></ui-button>";
  }
  function addDataDisplayFunction() {
    document.getElementById("replaceWebComponent").innerHTML = "<data-display 
    address=\"http://localhost:5500/data\"></data-display>";
  }
</script>
<div class="card">
  <div class="container" id="replaceWebComponent">
  </div>
</div>
